job.title: Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services
job.description:
Data Engineer with C++ and Python
Fulltime/Perm opportunity
Location: Wayne, PA (2 days a week on site once covid clears)
Solid python, C++ and sequel. C++ legacy code.
Engineering side of data, not analyst.
Remote to start but eventually would be in office, could be combo home and office.
Join a team of financial software specialists responsible for the acquisition and management of financial market and related data required for research implementation of systematic trading strategies.
#Dice-SPG
